araucaria.info: The araucaria colormap is a sequential colormap that transitions from deep blue to light pink, created with the viscm tool.

cerrado.info: The cerrado colormap is a sequential colormap with earthy tones, created via color interpolation in the Oklab space.

pampa.info: A diverging color map (magenta to teal) built by interpolating colors in the Msh space. It has a smooth transition in the middle to prevent artifacts at the midpoint.

pantanal.info: The pantanal colormap is a sequential colormap that transitions from white to light green, then teal, and finally dark red, created via color interpolation in the Oklab space.
